${ModID}:Whirligig.NAME: Whirligig
${ModID}:Whirligig.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 to a random enemy for each enemy in combat。

${ModID}:Sliiiiither.NAME: Sliiiiither
${ModID}:Sliiiiither.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, 抽 !M! to 3 additional 张牌。

${ModID}:TailFlail.NAME: Tail Flail
${ModID}:TailFlail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to !${ModID}:sd! damage to 所有敌人. NL Randomize the cost of !M! random 张牌。

${ModID}:Sneckpot.NAME: Sneckpot
${ModID}:Sneckpot.DESCRIPTION: Deal 1 to !D! damage. Roll the damage X times 并take the highest result。

${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.NAME: Whip 'n Snapper
${ModID}:WhipNSnapper.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 给予 !${ModID}:m2! to !M! Weak 并!${ModID}:m2! to !M! Vulnerable。

${ModID}:Twitch.NAME: Twitch
${ModID}:Twitch.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of !M! 张牌。 NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!
${ModID}:Twitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of up to !M! 张牌。 NL stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!

${ModID}:Gulp.NAME: Meal Prep
${ModID}:Gulp.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 for each energy this card costs。

${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.NAME: Snazzy Swagger
${ModID}:SnazzySwagger.DESCRIPTION: {@@}抽 !M! 张牌{!M!|>1=s}. NL Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand. NL 丢弃 !M! card{!M!|>1=s}。

${ModID}:SneckoEyes.NAME: Snecko Eyes
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.DESCRIPTION: Become Confused. 你的回合开始时， 抽2张牌。。
${ModID}:SneckoEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 你的回合开始时， 抽2张牌。. NL 战斗开始： Become Confused。

${ModID}:Shedding.NAME: Shedding
${ModID}:Shedding.DESCRIPTION: {@@}你的回合开始时， randomize the cost of the {!M!|>1=!M! highest cost cards|@=highest cost card} in your hand。
